affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Pure
attrib:
MISS RATE: 100% / 100% / 100% / 100%
CAST RANGE: 550
CAST RANGE WITH AGHANIM: 1100
cmb:
MANA COST: 95/120/145/170
COOLDOWN: 14
desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target for 3 seconds, causing it to miss all physical attacks.
notes: The damage is dealt immediately while the miss effect is delayed until the projectile hits.
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.
name: tinker_laser

cmb:
MANA COST: 120/140/160/180
COOLDOWN: 25
desc: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range.
lore: The last contraption Boush was able to save was a retrofitted rocket launcher with a homing mechanism.
name: tinker_heat_seeking_missile

cmb:
MANA COST: 145/150/165/190
COOLDOWN: 35
desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
notes: Robots spawn at a rate of 24 per second.
lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.
name: tinker_march_of_the_machines

cmb:
MANA COST: 150/250/350
COOLDOWN: 0
desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.
notes: Rearm works on all items except Black King Bar, Arcane Boots, Helm of the Dominator, Hand of Midas, Refresher Orb, and Necronomicon.
lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.
name: tinker_rearm
